About Us

  2. About Us

About Us

Al FARIS RENT A CAR is a company aiming to provide unforgettable driving experience to its customers. Al FARIS is always fully ready to provide its customers in the local market with top unrivaled services. Therefore, we always go beyond the call of duty to maintain a pioneering position ahead of our rivals.


Al FARIS RENT A CAR was founded in 2000, with the opening of its very first branch in Khamis Mushait. Today, Al FARIS RENT A CAR has more than 30 branches with 5000 cars across the Kingdom. So, if you are traveling across Riyadh, Jeddah, Dammam, Khamis Mushait, Abha, Jizan, or Khobar, you will definitely find one of our branches, where our staff will be so pleased and ready to help you. As part of its expansion strategy, AL FARIS RENT A CAR offers its services at three of Saudi Arabia’s main airports. Al FARIS RENT A CAR has now grown to be one of the major car renting companies in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

Why Us?

A wide presence with 30 branches across the country and our services are also offered at three internal airports

Cars are available in a great variety in terms of the model, size, and color to meet all tastes

We allow our customers to complete the renting process at one branch and return the car to another one.

Our services are available at competitive, affordable prices, in addition to providing companies with special offers and privileges.

We offer multi-membership loyalty programs that prove how important customers are for Al FARIS RENT A CAR.

Comprehensive insurance services for cars

We offer mobile maintenance services that are available 24/7.

We offer used car sale services to maintain our all-time renewable fleet.

BRANCH HOURS

Sat-Thurs: 8 AM to 12 AM

Fri: 4 PM to 12 AM

Branches in Jeddah and Abha airports are open 24 hours.

Working hours vary during the holy month of Ramadan.
